body: Starting at 4th level, whenever a technic scavenger triggers a glitch when using a timeworn technological item, she rolls twice and can choose which of the two glitch effects actually occurs. A technic scavenger always adds her level to rolls to determine what kind of glitch occurs, and treats rolls of over 100 as 100. This ability replaces uncanny dodge.
name: Lucky Glitch
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Technology in the world/Archtypes/Technology-Themed Archetypes/Technic Scavenger/Lucky Glitch
